name: Bluebell
description:
A long time ago, there stood a large city in the centre of the world.

It was known as a place of prosperity; of well-cultivated fruits and vegetables, fertile soil, and an abundance of grazing sands.

From the youngest to the oldest, weakest to the strongest: each citizen had a role to fulfill.

The people kept their city alive through times of peace and times of turmoil.

They kept no secrets from each other. ‘Secrets are the causes of conflict’, they say amongst themselves.

But there was one secret that had always been kept hidden from all of them.

Somewhere far away, abandoned by society, there is a large facility dedicated for those deemed as the “special” ones.

The very rare few who are familiar with the place know it as Bluebell.

******

As this is the jam version - the game will be on the first day only.
